column5: Since coming over to this new 'Board I've found that the Thumbnails and posted Links dont open when I click on them. I've tried it with Pop-up blocker off......Nada. Can anyone solve my problem[in plain simple language PLEASE]  I'm running Sympatico securities.  Thanks for any responses
don't know if it will help but hold ctrl and then click it might work.
If you can see the words [image] right click on the word and click on "view image" see if that helps you out.
Either of those suggestions should work, the only other thing I can think of is to check that your browser has cookies & java enabled.  Mike
Checked all three suggestions Guy's,  Zilch. Alas, woe is me  Thanks anyway........
Nanook,  What browser are you using? I just downloaded Firefox and I have to admit I am impressed with how elegant it is compared to IE...  Mike
